quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Well begun is half done.
You do not have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.
Imagination is the beginning of creation.
You cannot use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
Clarity of mind means clarity of passion, too.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
Simple can be harder than complex.
Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
Plans are nothing; planning is everything.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Victorious warriors win first and then go to war.
Believe you can and you are halfway there.
Whether you think you can, or you think you cannot, you are right.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
Nothing can be changed until it is faced.
It always seems impossible until it is done.
Nothing will work unless you do.
Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort.
Take the best that exists and make it better.
Details make perfection, and perfection is not a detail.
Quality is everyone's responsibility.
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
I have not failed. I have just found 10,000 ways that will not work.
I have failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
The first principle is that you must not fool yourself, and you are the easiest person to fool.
In God we trust; all others must bring data.
Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
The reward of a thing well done is to have done it.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Perfect is the enemy of good.
Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
Art is never finished, only abandoned.
Try to be better than yourself.
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
No man ever steps in the same river twice.
What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
